actions.committee: House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight.

official_title: To designate the United States Post Office building located at 251 West Lancaster Street in Fort Worth, Texas, as the "Jim Wright Post Office Building".

summary.text: Designates the U.S. Post Office building located at 251 West Lancaster Street in Fort Worth, Texas, as the Jim Wright Post Office Building.

titles.title: To designate the United States Post Office building located at 251 West Lancaster Street in Fort Worth, Texas, as the "Jim Wright Post Office Building".
